Crawlers,

I am trying to start crawls from an outside java
class, but I'm having trouble.  I looked in the
new.jsp pages, but I'm getting:

Exception in thread "main"
java.lang.NullPointerException
        at
org.archive.crawler.admin.CrawlJobHandler.getProfilesDirectory(CrawlJobHandler.java:281)
        at
org.archive.crawler.admin.CrawlJobHandler.loadProfiles(CrawlJobHandler.java:289)
        at
org.archive.crawler.admin.CrawlJobHandler.<init>(CrawlJobHandler.java:197)
        at
org.archive.crawler.admin.CrawlJobHandler.<init>(CrawlJobHandler.java:167)
        at jobber.main(jobber.java:20)

When i try to emulate what's going on in the jsp.
Looks like some kind of env thing - I've tried
setting HERETRIX_HOME in the shell and using:

java -Dheritrix.home=

without any change... any tips or more transparent
example code that might help me?

Thanks alot,

-miles
